DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate effect prebiotic synbiotic supplementation inflammatory response indicator nutritional status patient morbid obesity . Adult individual sex morbid obesity ( body mass index ≥ 40 kg/m² ) invite participate randomize , placebo-controlled , triple-blind study . The participant divide three group : G1 - control group ( placebo ) , G2 - prebiotic group G3 - synbiotic group . The study consist four experimental time point : M0 - baseline start supplementation ; M1 - fifteen day first outpatient visit fifteen day start supplementation prebiotic , synbiotic placebo ; M2 - thirty day first outpatient visit end supplementation prebiotic , synbiotic placebo ; M3 - time sixty day first outpatient visit . At time point inflammatory response assess determination plasma cytokine ( IL-1 , IL-6 , IL-10 , TNF ) acute phase protein ( c-reactive protein albumin ) , besides evaluation laboratory anthropometric indicator nutritional status . The primary endpoint reduction concentration inflammatory marker ( cytokine acute phase protein ) . Investigators expect contribute new information field knowledge , may facilitate clinical application result .
